channel.title: Obsidian on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Obsidian on Arrans github.io

item.title: obsidianmd/obsidian-releases
item.description: Community plugins list, theme list, and releases of Obsidian.

item.title: khoj-ai/khoj
item.description: Your AI second brain. Self-hostable. Get answers from the web or your docs. Build custom agents, schedule automations, do deep research. Turn any online or local LLM into your personal, autonomous AI (gpt, claude, gemini, llama, qwen, mistral). Get started - free.

item.title: siyuan-note/siyuan
item.description: A privacy-first, self-hosted, fully open source personal knowledge management software, written in typescript and golang.

item.title: basicmachines-co/basic-memory
item.description: AI conversations that actually remember. Never re-explain your project to Claude again. Local-first, integrates with Obsidian. Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/tyvKNccgqN
